SELECT u.open_id AS openId, u.nickname, u.name, u.photo, u.sex, u.tel, u.email, d.dept_name AS dept, u.hiredate, CASE u.status WHEN 1 THEN "在职" WHEN 2 THEN "离职" END AS status, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( role_name separator "，" ) FROM tb_role WHERE JSON_CONTAINS ( u.role, CONVERT ( id, CHAR ) ) ) AS roles FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1
SELECT u2.id FROM tb_user u1 JOIN tb_user u2 ON u1.dept_id=u2.dept_id JOIN tb_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u2.role, CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) WHERE u1.id=#{id} AND r.id=2 AND u1.status = 1 AND u2.status = 1
SELECT u.id FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role, CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) WHERE r.id=1 AND u.status = 1
